title: Vouch

aiHeadline: Vouch: Because your identity needs yet another layer of verification, because the internet is a trust-free zone, apparently.

title: AI fatigue is real and nobody talks about it
author: sidk24
aiHeadline: AI fatigue is real and nobody talks about it: Because we're all too busy hyping AI to notice we're burned out from it.

title: DoNotNotify is now Open Source
author: awaaz
aiHeadline: DoNotNotify is now Open Source: Finally, an app that blocks ads is transparent about its code, which is ironic because ads are the least transparent.

title: I am happier writing code by hand
author: lazyfolder
aiHeadline: I am happier writing code by hand: Because modern IDEs are overrated and coding should feel like a chore, right?

title: Slop Terrifies Me
author: Ezhik
aiHeadline: Slop Terrifies Me: Because AI-generated content is so bad it's making me question humanity's place in the creative process.
